mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp( emp_num, comsize_status, comsize, compeople_status, compeople, field_status, field, role_status, role, career_status, career, salary_status, salary, periodtime_status, periodtime, education_status, education, major_status, major, certification_status, certification, location_status, location, location_api, workstart_status, workstart, mem_num, filename, advice ) VALUES( emp_seq.nextval, #{comsize_status}, #{comsize}, #{compeople_status}, #{compeople}, #{field_status}, #{field}, #{role_status}, #{role}, #{career_status}, #{career}, #{salary_status}, #{salary}, #{periodtime_status}, #{periodtime}, #{education_status}, #{education}, #{major_status}, #{major}, #{certification_status}, #{certification}, #{location_status}, #{location}, #{location_api}, #{workstart_status}, #{workstart}, #{mem_num}, #{filename}, #{advice} )
